text: Chattogram Zila Krira Sangstha Swimming Complex is a mordern indoor swimming complex, located in outer stadium in Kazir Dewri, Chattogram, Bangladesh. ==Contraction== The construction was begun on February 2017 and completed in November 2018 with a area over of land at a cost of , under the National Sports Council of Bangladesh. ==Facilities== The complex has an international standard swimming complex having pool with length and width, with a capacity of containing 20 lakh litre of water. The pool has depth on average and has eight tracks. There are four side galleries with a capacity for around 1,500 viewers. The complex also has official rooms, Changing rooms, shower rooms, rest rooms, locker services and public toilet in the west side of the pool. ==References== ==External links== Category:2019 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Swimming pools Category:Swimming venues in Bangladesh Category:Sports in Bangladesh
title: Chattogram Zila Krira Sangstha Swimming Complex
